leads.lead_text: Plant glabrous or subglabrous; leaves linear to narrowly oblong
Leaves and branches sparsely covered with short appressed to weakly spreading hairs; leaves narrowly elliptic to elliptic
Branches minutely woolly; leaves densely silky-pubescent at least when young, linear to narrowly elliptic
